name: This Is Where I Want To Die
name_original: This Is Where I Want To Die
description:
A very short kinetic novel about a dying person trying to remember what happened. This Is Where I Want To Die is a depressing story with an important message I want to put across. The game is free to play and I would recommend it for players 16+. TIWIWTD was created in less than a month for NaNoRenO 2013.
